54 class Processor {
55 public:
56  struct Status {
57  Status() {}
58 
59  RJ::Time last_loop_time;
60  RJ::Time last_vision_time;
61  RJ::Time last_referee_time;
62  RJ::Time last_radio_rx_time;
63  };
64 
65  Processor(bool sim, bool blue_team, const std::string& read_log_file = "");
66  virtual ~Processor();

70  std::shared_ptr<Gameplay::GameplayModule> gameplay_module() const {
71  return gameplay_module_;
72  }
73 
74  Status status() {
75  std::lock_guard lock(status_mutex_);
76  return status_;
77  }
78 
79  float framerate() { return framerate_; }
80 
81  bool open_log(const QString& filename) {
82  logger_->write(filename.toStdString());
83  return true;
84  }
85 
86  void close_log() { logger_->close(); }
87 
88  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock_loop_mutex() {
89  return std::lock_guard(loop_mutex_);
90  }
91

104 
105  void run();

107 private:
114  void update_intent_active();
115 
117  volatile bool running_;
118 
119  // A logfile to read from.
120  // When empty, don't read logs at all.
121  std::string read_log_file_;
122 
123  // Locked when processing loop stuff is happening (not when blocked for
124  // timing or I/O). This is public so the GUI thread can lock it to access
125  // SystemState, etc.
126  std::mutex loop_mutex_;
127 
129  Context context_;
130 
131  // Processing period in microseconds
132  RJ::Seconds frame_period_ = RJ::Seconds(1) / 60;
133 
135  float framerate_;
136 
137  // This is used by the GUI to indicate status of the processing loop and
138  // network
139  std::mutex status_mutex_;
140  Status status_;
141 
142  // modules
143  std::shared_ptr<Gameplay::GameplayModule> gameplay_module_;
144  std::unique_ptr<Logger> logger_;
145 
146  std::shared_ptr<rclcpp::executors::SingleThreadedExecutor> ros_executor_;
147 
148  // ROS2 temporary modules
149  using WorldStateMsg = rj_msgs::msg::WorldState;
150  using AsyncWorldStateMsgQueue = rj_topic_utils::AsyncMessageQueue<
151  WorldStateMsg, rj_topic_utils::MessagePolicy::kQueue, 1>;
152 
153  AsyncWorldStateMsgQueue::UniquePtr world_state_queue_;
154 
155  std::unique_ptr<ros2_temp::SoccerConfigClient> config_client_;
156  std::unique_ptr<ros2_temp::RawVisionPacketSub> raw_vision_packet_sub_;
